metadata.title: CVE-2022-28550 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Matthias-Wandel/jhead jhead 3.06 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow viashellescape(), jhead.c, jhead. jhead copies strings to a stack buffer whenit detects a &i or &o. However, jhead does not check the boundary of thestack buffer. As a result, there will be a stack buffer overflow problemwhen multiple `&i` or `&o` are given.

criterions.comment: jhead package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
